sources.title: Trail of Terror (1935) BOB STEELE
sources.description:
Stars: Bob Steele, Beth Marion, Forrest Taylor
Director: Robert N. Bradbury

A man posing as an outlaw breaks out of jail to help find stolen money by infiltrating a gang whose paroled leader is the only one who can find it.

metadata.Plot: Manning breaks out of prison and joins Blake's gang of outlaws. Later a paroled Muggs arrives to rejoin the gang. Muggs is the only one who knows where the stolen money is hidden and Manning is after it.
metadata.Actors: Bob Steele, Beth Marion, Forrest Taylor
